text: Steve Davis (born 22 August 1957) is an English former professional snooker player. He was born in Plumstead, London. He has won the World Championship six times and dominated snooker in the eighties of the 20th century. Davis started his professional career in 1978. Ten years later he became the first player to complete snooker's Triple Crown by winning the UK Championship, Masters, and World Championship in the same season. == Other websites == * Steve Davis at snooker.org ==References== Category:1957 births Category:BBC people Category:Living people Category:English sports commentators Category:Sportspeople from London Category:English snooker players
title: Steve Davis
